sentences.en: Check the shutter dial and aperture ring to make sure you have the correct exposure.
sentences.cn: 检查快门速度光圈以确保正确的曝光量.

sentences.en: Enables continuous shooting as long as the shutter button is pressed.
sentences.cn: 只要按住快门按钮就能连续拍照.

sentences.en: He pressed the shutter when she smiled.
He racked his camera and pressed down the shutter release.
sentences.cn: 他将照相机的焦距调好,然后按下快门.

sentences.en: He reached up with a hooked pole to roll down the metal shutter.
sentences.cn: 他用带钩的杆子把金属护窗拉了下来。

sentences.en: Here, Bill, wrench the shutter open.
sentences.cn: 喂, 比尔, 把这扇窗板撬开.

sentences.en: It is built into the counter, and can be exposed by movement of a shutter.
sentences.cn: 它装在计数器中,移去挡片, 就可以产生照射.

sentences.en: Screw in cable release on shutter button.
She opened the shutters and gazed out over village roofs.
sentences.cn: 她打开了百叶窗，朝村里的房顶望去。

sentences.en: Simple and clear, the machine constant, the shutter flash, who can be.
sentences.cn: 简单明了, 机器?定, 快门一闪, 谁都能.

sentences.en: The camera has a shutter speed of one - sixtieth of a second.
sentences.cn: 这架照像机的快门速度达六十分之一秒.

sentences.en: The percentage depends on the conditions, shutter speed and focal length.
sentences.cn: 二者的比例取决于拍摄时的情况, 快门速度和焦距.

sentences.en: The shutter rattled in the wind.
sentences.cn: 百叶窗在风中发出嘎嘎声.

sentences.en: The slam of the shutter awoke me.
sentences.cn: 百叶窗砰的一声把我惊醒了.

sentences.en: There are a few things you should check before pressing the shutter release.
sentences.cn: 按下快门之前有几个地方要检查一下。

sentences.en: With this type of camera, the shutter speed is fixed.
sentences.cn: 对这类相机而言，快门的速度是固定的。

words.tran_cn: [摄]快门；[建]百叶窗；关闭物；[机]遮板

phrases.tran_cn: 防火活门，防火卷帘门；防火闸；防火板；防火百叶窗
（商业机构）结束营业，（永久性）停业
快门线；快门释放；快门掣；快门启放器

trans.tran_en: one of a pair of wooden or metal covers on the outside of a window that can be closed to keep light out or prevent thieves from coming in

trans.tran_cn: 为…装百叶窗；以百叶窗遮闭
